name: DomMutable
description: Used to observe dom changes via Mutation Observer.

attributes.name: mutationTarget
attributes.description: Sets the element which will be observed for mutations. Usually this is the component itself.

attributes.name: observeSubtree
attributes.description: Passed through to the internal mutation observer - set to true if mutations to not just target, but also target's descendants are to be observed.

attributes.name: observeCharacterData
attributes.description: Passed through to the internal mutation observer - Set to true if mutations to target's data are to be observed.

attributes.name: observeAttributes
attributes.description: Passed through to the internal mutation observer - Set to true if mutations to target's attributes are to be observed.
